channel.title: Quest Log
channel.description:
I posted this in client help because I believe it is client sided...
Okay, so...I was wondering if anyone knew how to make say....Yellow and green colored words in the quest log highlight/light up like in runescape, because I can only get red (Not @red@, they appear red normally) colored words to highlight...
Thanks, -Set
